title: BUCKTOWN 606 TRAIL
posting_body: Come experience this beautiful apartment in Bucktown near the 606 Bloomingdale Trail for $1600 per month.
It is a 2nd floor sun filled apartment with cross breezes facing South and East.
Please call or TEXT for an appointment 312-855-1300.
TEXT is the fasted way to reach me.
* Central Heat with window unit Air Conditioning
* Laundry; 4 Coin operated machines in laundry room,
* Renovated Bath with Shower over Tub
Large Enclosed Deck over the garage.
NOTE: NO GRANITE; NO STAINLESS; NO KING BED, BUT NICELY UPGRADED.

We're looking for individual, roommates or a family for this sunny, breezy 2 bedroom air conditioned apartment located 1 block from the 606 Bloomingdale Trail, 3 blocks from the Map Room and 5 blocks to the Elevated Blue Line at North/Damen/Milwaukee.
* We do not charge move-in fees
* We pay for water; you heat it,
* 3 blocks to the Map Room and Starbucks,
* 5 Blocks to the Blue Line at Milwaukee, Damen, North,
* Dozens of shops, restaurants and bars in area,
* A few short blocks to the Kennedy Expressway,
Please call or TEXT for an appointment 312-855-1300.
We are hands on owners who maintain the property in good condition.
Please call or TEXT for an appointment 312-855-1300.
TEXT is the fastest way to reach me.
